page.name: samples/cura
page.summary:
Cura is a latin words that means to manage. From a functionality point of a view, Cura is a project management application. It allows management of individual people, projects and clients. From the utility standpoint, however, Cura is an exceptional example application that demonstrates a large number of Sparx development Best Practices.
App: http://developer.netspective.com/samples/cura (username 'cura', password 'cura')
ACE: http://developer.netspective.com/samples/cura/ace (username 'ace', password 'ace')
